item.title: Thieving gps PI
item.dc:creator: @poop_on_u234 poop on u234
item.description:
@poop_on_u234 wrote:

This is whats in my ActionHandler:

case 4874: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 100, 1); break; case 4875: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 200, 25); break; case 4876: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 300, 50); break; case 4877: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 400, 75); break; case 4878: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(995, 500, 90); break;

How would I increase the amount of 995 stolen from each stall?

Read full topic
